# [Story] ORB-062: Build Boost Detector

## Parent Epic

Parent: #521 (Content-to-Ads)

## Description

Create a boost detector that identifies high-performing organic posts, calculates boost potential, predicts ROI, and enables one-click boost activation.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Automatic identification of posts exceeding performance thresholds
- [ ] Boost potential score based on engagement velocity and audience match
- [ ] ROI prediction model showing expected reach, engagement, and cost
- [ ] One-click boost with pre-configured targeting and budget options
- [ ] Performance comparison dashboard for boosted vs organic reach

## Technical Notes

- Implement real-time monitoring of organic post performance via webhooks
- Train ROI prediction model on historical boost performance data
- Create boost templates for quick activation with saved audience segments
